verbs.description: [ARG0: russians] [V: blame] [ARG1: western subculture] [ARG2: for school massacre] [ARGM-TMP: after wednesday massacre at a vocational school in crimea] russians are looking for answers — and some of them are looking toward the west vladimir putin said thursday that the gun and bomb attack carried out by a student in kerch appears to be a result of globalization the bbc reports political analyst kerch veronika skvortsova bbc school us vladislav roslyakov ap vladimir putin cnn sergey mikheyev
